name: 玄尘仙途
description:
"Xuan Chen Xian Tu" is a Q version of the large-scale multiplayer online role-playing game of the Xian Xia style. Click-to-play game features, players can ride the wind sword in the game, experience the thrill of cultivation. At the same time, you can also freely match the game fashion, dress up the most cute, best-looking fairy characters. In addition, the original partner, Xiuxian, artifact and other systems give players a stronger sense of substitution! At the same time, the game has a variety of gameplay, such as sword flying, artifacts, cute cute pets, gorgeous wings, and beautiful mounts. Give players a perfect experience of cultivation. "Xuanchen Xiantu" not only performs gorgeously on the game screen, but also has a special effect. The Q version of Meng is also in the game to integrate the Xianxia strategy and the fashion matching gameplay, which greatly enhances the fun of the player's game.

heritage classic Xian Xia mobile game

In the way of Xuanchenxian, all kinds of gameplay are available. Players can chat while playing games and hang up automatically!

Enriched gameplay, world BOSS, PK

There are a lot of gameplay in the game, and players can choose male or female when they enter the game. The game retains the original Xian Xia classic gameplay and super cute love pets
developers: 深圳市原点互动科技有限公司
publishers: 深圳市原点互动科技有限公司
